As Grimlock walked out a storm of dust erupted from the corner of of
the hall.  As the smoke and dust cleared all that was left was a hole
in the wall and standing in the middle was Slag.
'Rumour is your sendin us with this rookie...' he spit out towards
Ironhide.  I'm only going to go because if not well.....i don't know y
i am going...' he said again looking to the bit of oil on the floor by
Pacifix.  He opened his mouth and a small blast of flame erupted from
it igniting  the oil.
"Bah" he said to PAcifix then leaving out the same hole he cmae through.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> "If others nervous it cause they weak" Grimlock said with contempt, not
> at Swoop, but aimed at all the peace loving Autobots. He looked at
> Pacifix, and pointed his sword, "DAMN STRAIGHT YOU HAPPY WE COME WITH
> YOU. YOU NOT SURVIVE OTHERWISE. ONLY ONE WAY TO WIN FIGHT, AND IT NOT
> INVOLVE AUDIO MODUEL". Ironhide frowned. It was really a pathetic
> counter to Pacifix. He was suprised with Pacifix's maturity, it normally
> took Autobots eons to grow up, at least, it did for him. "Is anyone
> opposed to the Dinobots going along?" He asked. The room was silent, you
> could have heard a nebulan clip his tone nails. He had expected more
> against it, then realized that Grimlock still held his sword. He didnt
> blame anyone for not objecting. "Fine then Grimlock, you will go too, I
> suppose they might need your muscle," He said. All Grimlock could do was
> looked pissed, "Slggin right" is all he said, as he walked past Swoop,
> and towards Pacifix. He looked down at his future comander, and spat a
> glob of oil beside him, then stormed out.
